main: ^Hello, I can assist you. Please tell me your symptoms.

s: ^I feel extremely weak and have no energy. I feel like my life is slipping away every day.

illness: ^It sounds like a rare disease from our planet. This illness requires specialized treatment; otherwise, it will continue to deplete your life force.
^Luckily, we have a highly effective treatment, but it costs 500 coins.

s: ^500 coins? That's a lot of money, but I don't have that much.

Coins: ^I understand your difficulty, but if this condition isn't treated promptly, the consequences will be severe.
^If you're willing, I can negotiate with the hospital to see if they can provide some assistance.

s: ^I'm willing to do everything I can to raise the treatment funds.

MakeMoney: ^Very well, I will arrange the treatment as soon as possible. Please rest assured; we will do our best to help you regain your health.
